name: Overlooking View
description: Reach the very top of Qingyun Peak.

name: The Remains of the Gale
description: Reach the top of the tower in Stormterror's Lair.

name: "Seeds of Stories, Brought By the Wind..."
description: Reach the nameless island northeast of Mondstadt.

name: Unswerving
description: Open the chest in the middle of the heart-shaped rock formation.

name: Initiating Warp Drive!
description: Pass through the time tunnel in the skies of Cape Oath.

name: Beloved of the Anemo Archon
description: Take a seat in the hands of the God Statue in Mondstadt.

name: The Best Sword in the Cemetery
description: Unlock the Tri-Seal of the Sword Cemetery.

name: Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula
description: Follow in the footsteps of immortals, and unlock the Domain's door.

name: Cecilia Garden
description: Return the Seelie to their rightful places and unlock the entrance to a Domain in Wolvendom.

name: Hidden Palace of Zhou Formula
description: Follow the Seelie and light the torches to unlock the entrance to a domain in Wuwang Hill.

name: "If you put your heart into it..."
description: Cook 1 suspicious-tasting dish.

name: "...Anyone can be a gourmet."
description: Cook 10 suspicious-tasting dishes.

name: Boared to Death
description: Be defeated by a wild boar.

name: Golden Gliding License
description: Glide a long, long distance in one go.

name: It's the Same As Having Wings
description: Glide continuously for over 80s.

name: Quick As Lightning
description: Sprint continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.

name: Friends the World Over
description: Meet all sorts of people during your adventure.

name: Megastar in Mondstadt
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Mondstadt.

name: Legend in Liyue
description: Reach Reputation Lv. 8 in Liyue.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete 10 Bounties.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete 20 Bounties.

name: QUEST CLEAR
description: Complete 30 Bounties.

description: Complete 10 Requests.

name: Hero-in-Training
description: Complete 20 Requests.

name: Hero-in-Training
description: Complete 30 Requests.

name: QUEST FAILED
description: Lost track of a Bounty target.

name: The Bleak Midwinter
description: Succumb to Sheer Cold...

name: Priest, Princess, and Scribe
description: Claim the treasure of the Entombed City.

name: Prodigal Son's Return
description: Follow the path of one of the members of the long-lost investigation team to where they embarked on their journey home.

name: Snow-Stored History
description: Discover the fate of a long-lost investigation team that once explored Dragonspine.

name: Glacial Steel
description: Obtain an ancient weapon made of Starsilver.

name: Futile Endeavor
description: Discover the remains of many ruin machines.

name: Untellable Tale
description: Make an unexpected friend in an unexpected location.

name: Towering Achievement
description: Reach the summit of Dragonspine.

name: Winter Wonderland
description: Discover a Cryo Crystalfly beneath a snow pile.

name: The Hunter Becomes the Hunted
description: Be defeated by The Great Snowboar King.

name: Chill Out!
description: Defeat The Great Snowboar King while the latter is in berserker mode.

name: Glutton for Goulash
description: Learn to make Goulash.

name: Wrath of the Gods
description: Get struck by lightning.

name: Sky High
description: Climb the Skyfrost Nail after it has been restored.

name: Juggernaut
description: Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.

name: The PRISM Program
description: Break all of an Electro Hypostasis' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

name: "That's one big Crystalfly"
description: Absorb all of an Anemo Hypostasis' Wind Crystals before it can be revived.

name: "...Not indicative of final product"
description: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis that has undergone 4 types of Elemental Conversions.

name: The Bigger They Are...
description: Paralyze a Ruin Guard by attacking its weak point.

name: Through Pass
description: Knock a Pyro Slime out of the hands of a Hilichurl Grenadier.

name: Dolorous Stroke
description: Defeat an opponent by Shattering the ice they are trapped in.

name: Hilichurl Champion
description: Defeat a Stonehide Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

name: Bon App√©tit
description: Have 4 party members in the Full state at the same time.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over 5,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over 20,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Purveyor of Punishment
description: Deal over 50,000 CRIT DMG.

name: Fantastic Four
description: Complete a Domain using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.

name: "Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"
description: Defeat a Cryo Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

name: "That Was Blooming Hot"
description: Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

name: Outlander Vs. Outlander
description: Defeat Childe without any party member being marked and then hit by his follow-up attack.

name: The End of the Beginning
description: Complete the Mondstadt Archon Quests.

name: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind
description: Complete "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

name: For a Tomorrow Without Tears
description: Complete "For a Tomorrow Without Tears."

name: Song of the Dragon and Freedom
description: Complete "Song of the Dragon and Freedom."

name: Let the Wind Lead
description: Obtain the power of Anemo.

name: ...Or a New Storm?
description: Banish the dragon attacking Mondstadt.

description: Fail to borrow the Holy Relic... but learn of the Knights' dilemma.

name: Winds Change Their Course
description: Be rescued by Dvalin.

name: Of the Land Amidst Monoliths
description: Complete "Of the Land Amidst Monoliths"

name: Farewell, Archaic Lord
description: Complete "Farewell, Archaic Lord."

description: Figure out which perfume Rex Lapis is fond of.

description: Clean Madame Ping's teapot.

description: You failed to find the Cocogoat... but manage to repair a mechanism.

description: Prepare everything necessary for the Rite of Parting.

description: Defeat the Overlord of the Vortex.

name: Final Farewell
description: Take part in the Rite of Parting.

description: Select the highest-value jade on your first try.
